title: PMS 2.0 457 - The World Games Begin Tomorrow, Carnival Nightmares, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat all about the World Games beginning tomorrow and whether or not they are going to happen, who some of the betting favorites are, which events they're looking forward to most. They also cover Lamar Jackson reportedly being on the verge of getting a new contract worth $40-45 million a year, and what that means for Baker Mayfield and Josh Allen who are about to get broken off as well. They also cover state fairs, carnie's, and everything else going on on a slow news day. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
